name: Single filer at high income
description: High earner at €100,000 in Spain - above Social Security max base

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 Spanish national IRPF rates, Social Security (capped), and solidarity contribution
sources.notes: IRPF: up to 45% bracket. SS capped at €61,214.40. Solidarity: progressive brackets on €38,785.60 excess (0.19%/0.21%/0.24%). Total solidarity: ~€82.68.
